actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide grants to communities affected by substance use disorder to enable those communities to plan for and implement full-service community schools.
short_title: Full-Service Community Schools in Distressed Communities Act of 2018

summary.text:
Full-Service Community Schools in Distressed Communities Act of 2018

This bill requires the Department of Education to award grants that support the implementation of full-service community schools in localities affected by substance-use disorders.

titles.title: A bill to provide grants to communities affected by substance use disorder to enable those communities to plan for and implement full-service community schools.
